channel.title: Stay on Obsidian
channel.description: Recent content in Stay on Obsidian

item.title: Mar 28
item.description: Prompt: Write a blog post on how to stay creative Mar 28 [!tldr] Mar 28 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize In today’s digital age, staying creative has become increasingly important. With all the distractions and interruptions, it can be challenging to find time for creativity in our busy schedules. But let me share with you a few tips on how to stay creative! Take breaks: Sometimes we get so caught up in work or life that we forget to take breaks.

item.title: Mar 26
item.description: Prompt: Act as if you were a developer, write a post on how to stay productive by using nowadays technologies Mar 26 [!tldr] Mar 26 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize As a busy programmer and project manager, I know how important it is to be efficient and focused to get things done. Here are some nowaday technologies that can help you stay productive: Productivity software: There are several productivity software tools out there, such as Trello, Asana, Monday, and Monday.
